title: Chunky Chimp
description: Chunky is different, not like the rest of the chimps. Heâ€™s told he belongs in Tree World, but his heart belongs in the groundlands.
quote: You can find the magic pine cone, Chunky. You just have to be yourself!
altHero: Chunky Chimp raising a victorious fist as his bicycle glider flies through the air
alt1: Chunky, in a tree, shows his bike invention to another chimp
alt2: Chunky talks with a leopard in some tall grass
alt3: Chunky climbs a mountain in the rain
alt4: Chunky riding downhill and a glowing pine cone floats beside him
